definition: to throw down/to fall/to drop and break

sentences.english: He set on people to persuade him to wrestle with the famous wrestler .
sentences.chinese: 他嗾使人去劝他跟那个有名的摔跤师去摔跤。

sentences.english: He set on people to persuade him to wrestle with the famous wrestler .
sentences.chinese: 他嗾使人去劝他跟那个有名的摔跤师去摔跤。

sentences.english: In today's P. E. class, we are going to learn.
sentences.chinese: 今天的体育课，我们要去跤场学习摔跤。

sentences.english: Don't look behind or you may fall.
sentences.chinese: 别向后看，不然你会摔跤的。

sentences.english: However, the phenomenon of his son's falling down occurred more frequently and even severely.
sentences.chinese: 但是，陈立光跌倒摔跤的印象越来越严重。

sentences.english: North Korea has relied upon weightlifting, wrestling and judo for its Olympic success.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜依赖举重，摔跤和柔道在奥运会上取得了成功。

sentences.english: The culture of NaoYang wrestle is a kind of human legacy with an active culture.
sentences.chinese: 挠羊摔跤文化是一种活态体育人文遗产。

sentences.english: French type designer known for establishing the roman-style letter as the standard in printing.
sentences.chinese: 被认可的两种摔跤项目是古典式和自由式摔跤。

sentences.english: French type designer known for establishing the roman-style letter as the standard in printing.
sentences.chinese: 被认可的两种摔跤项目是古典式和自由式摔跤。

sentences.english: Mongols live in Mongolia autonomous region. They like wrestling.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古族人居住在内蒙古自治区，喜欢摔跤。
摔跤运动员扭住了对手。

sentences.english: Pols recommends "The Wrestler, " blood and all, as a date movie.
sentences.chinese: Pols推荐血腥的《摔跤手》作为约会电影。

sentences.english: Wrestling is an important activity in the lives of the Inner Mongolian people.
sentences.chinese: 摔跤比赛是蒙古族人生活中的一项重要活动。

sentences.english: Wresting is a form of empty-hand combat.
sentences.chinese: 摔跤是一项徒手进行的格斗运动。

sentences.english: There are traditional performances of wrestling and bull-fighting.
sentences.chinese: 传统的表演有摔跤和斗牛。

sentences.english: For some reason, many of these boys were wrestlers.
sentences.chinese: 不知道为什么，这些男孩子中有很多都是摔跤手。

definition: to fall down/to slip and fall/to throw sb to the ground
to fall/fig. to suffer a setback
to injure oneself in a fall
